section.p: This field indicates the category of the chief surgeon. The suggested code choices are: V=VA Team, M=Mixed VA and non VA, N=Non VA, 1=Staff FT, 2-Staff PT, 3=Consultant, 4=Attending, 5=Fee Basis, 6=Resident, 7=Other (Includes Interns), ETC.

ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] typeOfSurgeon with data type Code
First in the list is the Chief Surgeon; 2nd in the list is the first assistant. This field indicates the category of the chief surgeon. The suggested code choices are: V=VA Team, M=Mixed VA and non VA, N=Non VA, 1=Staff FT, 2-Staff PT, 3=Consultant, 4=Attending, 5=Fee Basis, 6=Resident, 7=Other (Includes Interns), ETC.

Contains zero or more [0..*] typeOfSurgeon with data type Code
First in the list is the Chief Surgeon; 2nd in the list is the first assistant. This field indicates the category of the chief surgeon. The suggested code choices are: V=VA Team, M=Mixed VA and non VA, N=Non VA, 1=Staff FT, 2-Staff PT, 3=Consultant, 4=Attending, 5=Fee Basis, 6=Resident, 7=Other (Includes Interns), ETC.
